name: Let's Encrypt
description: Automatic creation, renewal and configuration of Let's Encrypt certificates.

EMAIL_LETS_ENCRYPT.help: Email used for Let's Encrypt notification and in certificate.
EMAIL_LETS_ENCRYPT.label: Email Let's Encrypt

LETS_ENCRYPT_CHALLENGE.help: The challenge type to use for Let's Encrypt (http or dns).
LETS_ENCRYPT_CHALLENGE.label: Challenge Type

LETS_ENCRYPT_DNS_PROVIDER.help: The DNS provider to use for DNS challenges.
LETS_ENCRYPT_DNS_PROVIDER.label: DNS Provider

LETS_ENCRYPT_DNS_PROPAGATION.help: The time to wait for DNS propagation in seconds for DNS challenges.
LETS_ENCRYPT_DNS_PROPAGATION.label: DNS Propagation

LETS_ENCRYPT_DNS_CREDENTIAL_ITEM.help: Configuration item that will be added to the credentials.ini file for the DNS provider (e.g. 'cloudflare_api_token 123456') for DNS challenges.
LETS_ENCRYPT_DNS_CREDENTIAL_ITEM.label: Credential Item

USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_WILDCARD.help: Create wildcard certificates for all domains. This allows a single certificate to secure multiple subdomains. (Only available with DNS challenges)
USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_WILDCARD.label: Wildcard Certificates

USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_STAGING.help: Use the staging environment for Letâ€™s Encrypt certificate generation. Useful when you are testing your deployments to avoid being rate limited in the production environment.
USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_STAGING.label: Use Let's Encrypt Staging

LETS_ENCRYPT_CLEAR_OLD_CERTS.label: Clear old certificates when they are no longer needed
